verses.verse: And the LORD <WH3068> spoke <WH559> unto <WH413> Moses, <WH4872> Go <WH935> unto <WH413> Pharaoh, <WH6547> and say <WH559> unto <WH413> him, Thus <WH3541> saith <WH559> the LORD, <WH3068> Let <WH853> my people <WH5971> go, <WH7971> that they may serve <WH5647> me.
And if <WH518> thou <WH859> refuse <WH3986> to let them go, <WH7971> behold, <WH2009> I <WH595> will smite <WH5062> <WH853> all <WH3605> thy borders <WH1366> with frogs: <WH6854>

And the river <WH2975> shall bring forth frogs abundantly, <WH8317> <WH6854> which shall go up <WH5927> and come <WH935> into thine house, <WH1004> and into thy bedchamber, <WH2315> <WH4904> and upon <WH5921> thy bed, <WH4296> and into the house <WH1004> of thy servants, <WH5650> and upon thy people, <WH5971> and into thine ovens, <WH8574> and into thy kneading troughs: <WH4863>
And the frogs <WH6854> shall come up <WH5927> both on thee, and upon thy people, <WH5971> and upon all <WH3605> thy servants. <WH5650>

And the LORD <WH3068> spoke <WH559> unto <WH413> Moses, <WH4872> Say <WH559> unto <WH413> Aaron, <WH175> Stretch forth <WH5186> <WH853> thine hand <WH3027> with thy rod <WH4294> over <WH5921> the streams, <WH5104> over <WH5921> the rivers, <WH2975> and over <WH5921> the ponds, <WH98> and cause <WH853> frogs <WH6854> to come up <WH5927> upon <WH5921> the land <WH776> of Egypt. <WH4714>

And Aaron <WH175> stretched out <WH5186> <WH853> his hand <WH3027> over <WH5921> the waters <WH4325> of Egypt; <WH4714> and the frogs <WH6854> came up, <WH5927> and covered <WH3680> <WH853> the land <WH776> of Egypt. <WH4714>
And the magicians <WH2748> did <WH6213> so <WH3651> with their enchantments, <WH3909> and brought up <WH5927> <WH853> frogs <WH6854> upon <WH5921> the land <WH776> of Egypt. <WH4714>

Then Pharaoh <WH6547> called <WH7121> for Moses <WH4872> and Aaron, <WH175> and said, <WH559> Entreat <WH6279> <WH413> the LORD, <WH3068> that he may take away <WH5493> the frogs <WH6854> from <WH4480> me, and from my people; <WH4480> <WH5971> and I will let <WH853> the people <WH5971> go, <WH7971> that they may do sacrifice <WH2076> unto the LORD. <WH3068>

And Moses <WH4872> said <WH559> unto Pharaoh, <WH6547> Glory <WH6286> over <WH5921> me: when <WH4970> shall I entreat <WH6279> for thee, and for thy servants, <WH5650> and for thy people, <WH5971> to destroy <WH3772> the frogs <WH6854> from <WH4480> thee and thy houses, <WH4480> <WH1004> that they may remain <WH7604> in the river <WH2975> only? <WH7535>

And he said, <WH559> Tomorrow. <WH4279> And he said, <WH559> Be it according to thy word: <WH1697> that <WH4616> thou mayest know <WH3045> that <WH3588> there is none <WH369> like unto the LORD <WH3068> our God. <WH430>

And the frogs <WH6854> shall depart <WH5493> from <WH4480> thee and from thy houses, <WH4480> <WH1004> and from thy servants, <WH4480> <WH5650> and from thy people; <WH4480> <WH5971> they shall remain <WH7604> in the river <WH2975> only. <WH7535>

And Moses <WH4872> and Aaron <WH175> went out <WH3318> from <WH4480> <WH5973> Pharaoh: <WH6547> and Moses <WH4872> cried <WH6817> unto <WH413> the LORD <WH3068> because of <WH5921> <WH1697> the frogs <WH6854> which <WH834> he had brought <WH7760> against Pharaoh. <WH6547>

And the LORD <WH3068> did <WH6213> according to the word <WH1697> of Moses; <WH4872> and the frogs <WH6854> died <WH4191> out of <WH4480> the houses, <WH1004> out of <WH4480> the villages, <WH2691> and out of <WH4480> the fields. <WH7704>
And they gathered them together <WH6651> <WH853> upon heaps: <WH2563> <WH2563> and the land <WH776> stank. <WH887>

But when Pharaoh <WH6547> saw <WH7200> that <WH3588> there was <WH1961> respite, <WH7309> he hardened <WH3513> <WH853> his heart, <WH3820> and hearkened <WH8085> not <WH3808> unto <WH413> them; as <WH834> the LORD <WH3068> had said. <WH1696>

And the LORD <WH3068> said <WH559> unto <WH413> Moses, <WH4872> Say <WH559> unto <WH413> Aaron, <WH175> Stretch out <WH5186> <WH853> thy rod, <WH4294> and smite <WH5221> <WH853> the dust <WH6083> of the land, <WH776> that it may become <WH1961> lice <WH3654> throughout all <WH3605> the land <WH776> of Egypt. <WH4714>

And they did <WH6213> so; <WH3651> for Aaron <WH175> stretched out <WH5186> <WH853> his hand <WH3027> with his rod, <WH4294> and smote <WH5221> <WH853> the dust <WH6083> of the earth, <WH776> and it became <WH1961> lice <WH3654> in man, <WH120> and in beast; <WH929> all <WH3605> the dust <WH6083> of the land <WH776> became <WH1961> lice <WH3654> throughout all <WH3605> the land <WH776> of Egypt. <WH4714>

And the magicians <WH2748> did <WH6213> so <WH3651> with their enchantments <WH3909> to bring forth <WH3318> <WH853> lice, <WH3654> but they could <WH3201> not: <WH3808> so there were <WH1961> lice <WH3654> upon man, <WH120> and upon beast. <WH929>

Then the magicians <WH2748> said <WH559> unto <WH413> Pharaoh, <WH6547> This <WH1931> is the finger <WH676> of God: <WH430> and Pharaoh's <WH6547> heart <WH3820> was hardened, <WH2388> and he hearkened <WH8085> not <WH3808> unto <WH413> them; as <WH834> the LORD <WH3068> had said. <WH1696>

And the LORD <WH3068> said <WH559> unto <WH413> Moses, <WH4872> Rise up early <WH7925> in the morning, <WH1242> and stand <WH3320> before <WH6440> Pharaoh; <WH6547> lo, <WH2009> he cometh forth <WH3318> to the water; <WH4325> and say <WH559> unto <WH413> him, Thus <WH3541> saith <WH559> the LORD, <WH3068> Let my people <WH5971> go, <WH7971> that they may serve <WH5647> me.

Else, <WH3588> if <WH518> thou wilt not <WH369> let <WH853> my people <WH5971> go, <WH7971> behold, <WH2009> I will send <WH7971> <WH853> swarms <WH6157> of flies upon thee, and upon thy servants, <WH5650> and upon thy people, <WH5971> and into thy houses: <WH1004> and the houses <WH1004> of the Egyptians <WH4714> shall be full <WH4390> of <WH853> swarms <WH6157> of flies, and also <WH1571> the ground <WH127> whereon <WH834> <WH5921> they <WH1992> are.

And I will sever <WH6395> in that <WH1931> day <WH3117> <WH853> the land <WH776> of Goshen, <WH1657> in <WH5921> which <WH834> my people <WH5971> dwell, <WH5975> that no <WH1115> swarms <WH6157> of flies shall be <WH1961> there; <WH8033> to the end <WH4616> thou mayest know <WH3045> that <WH3588> I <WH589> am the LORD <WH3068> in the midst <WH7130> of the earth. <WH776>
And I will put <WH7760> a division <WH6304> between <WH996> my people <WH5971> and thy people: <WH5971> tomorrow <WH4279> shall this <WH2088> sign <WH226> be. <WH1961>

And the LORD <WH3068> did <WH6213> so; <WH3651> and there came <WH935> a grievous <WH3515> swarm <WH6157> of flies into the house <WH1004> of Pharaoh, <WH6547> and into his servants' <WH5650> houses, <WH1004> and into all <WH3605> the land <WH776> of Egypt: <WH4714> the land <WH776> was corrupted <WH7843> by reason of <WH4480> <WH6440> the swarm <WH6157> of flies.
And Pharaoh <WH6547> called <WH7121> for <WH413> Moses <WH4872> and for Aaron, <WH175> and said, <WH559> Go <WH1980> ye, sacrifice <WH2076> to your God <WH430> in the land. <WH776>

And Moses <WH4872> said, <WH559> It is not <WH3808> meet <WH3559> so <WH3651> to do; <WH6213> for <WH3588> we shall sacrifice <WH2076> the abomination <WH8441> of the Egyptians <WH4714> to the LORD <WH3068> our God: <WH430> lo, <WH2005> shall we sacrifice <WH2076> <WH853> the abomination <WH8441> of the Egyptians <WH4714> before their eyes, <WH5869> and will they not <WH3808> stone <WH5619> us?

We will go <WH1980> three <WH7969> days' <WH3117> journey <WH1870> into the wilderness, <WH4057> and sacrifice <WH2076> to the LORD <WH3068> our God, <WH430> as <WH834> he shall command <WH559> <WH413> us.

And Pharaoh <WH6547> said, <WH559> I <WH595> will let you go, <WH7971> that ye may sacrifice <WH2076> to the LORD <WH3068> your God <WH430> in the wilderness; <WH4057> only <WH7535> ye shall not <WH3808> go <WH1980> very far away: <WH7368> <WH7368> entreat <WH6279> for <WH1157> me.

And Moses <WH4872> said, <WH559> Behold, <WH2009> I <WH595> go out <WH3318> from <WH4480> <WH5973> thee, and I will entreat <WH6279> <WH413> the LORD <WH3068> that the swarms <WH6157> of flies may depart <WH5493> from Pharaoh, <WH4480> <WH6547> from his servants, <WH4480> <WH5650> and from his people, <WH4480> <WH5971> tomorrow: <WH4279> but <WH7535> let not <WH408> Pharaoh <WH6547> deal deceitfully <WH2048> any more <WH3254> in not <WH1115> letting <WH853> the people <WH5971> go <WH7971> to sacrifice <WH2076> to the LORD. <WH3068>
And Moses <WH4872> went out <WH3318> from <WH4480> <WH5973> Pharaoh, <WH6547> and entreated <WH6279> <WH413> the LORD. <WH3068>

And the LORD <WH3068> did <WH6213> according to the word <WH1697> of Moses; <WH4872> and he removed <WH5493> the swarms <WH6157> of flies from Pharaoh, <WH4480> <WH6547> from his servants, <WH4480> <WH5650> and from his people; <WH4480> <WH5971> there remained <WH7604> not <WH3808> one. <WH259>
And Pharaoh <WH6547> hardened <WH3513> <WH853> his heart <WH3820> at this <WH2063> time <WH6471> also, <WH1571> neither <WH3808> would he let <WH853> the people <WH5971> go. <WH7971>
